name: KLARNA BANK AB
goal: Klarna is a leading payments provider that aims to make the payment process simple, smooth and safe for customers and its merchant partners.Klarna works together with 70,000 merchants to offer payment solutions to more than 60 million users in Europe and North America. Founded in Stockholm in 2005, Klarna has 1,500 employees and is active in 18 countries.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation
